Name: Panama
Description: The capital region, which includes the city of Panama, known for its economic activity, financial center, and the Panama Canal.

Name: Cocle
Description: Known for its agricultural production, including sugar, rice, and cattle. It is home to beautiful beaches and mountain areas.

Name: Colon
Description: Located on the Caribbean coast, this region is known for its port city of Colón and the nearby Panamá Canal ports.

Name: Chiriqui
Description: Known for its cool mountain climate, agriculture, and tourism, especially the Boquete area.

Name: Veraguas
Description: A region known for its agricultural activities, including rice, cattle, and banana production.

Name: Bocas del Toro
Description: An island region known for its tourism, beautiful beaches, and the Bocas del Toro archipelago.

Name: Herrera
Description: Known for its agriculture, especially sugarcane, and the region’s significant historical heritage.

Name: Los Santos
Description: Famous for its agriculture, particularly its production of sugar and rice. It is home to the Azuero Peninsula.

Name: Panama Oeste
Description: A growing suburban region surrounding the capital city, known for its residential areas and growing urbanization.

Name: Embera-Wounaan
Description: A region mainly inhabited by indigenous Embera and Wounaan peoples, known for its natural reserves and river systems.
